name: Falling For You
description:
In Falling For You players take the role of two culsits plummeting to their deaths after being sacreficed by their respectice cults, while fighting over who gets to give their remaining life-force to their favourite god.

UI design: Bastian Hagege

Characters and animations: Dorothea Trötsch

Backgrounds and environments: Marc Kupecek

Programming: Patrick Stengel

Programming: Thomas Metzger

Sound: Stefan Gores

Intro Sound: https://pixabay.com/de/music/chor-cinematic-soundtrack-monk-cathedral-chant-877/
